long_description: Protect your sunglasses with the Pepper's Sport Sunglasses case. This case is ideal for travel, camping and everyday use. Constructed with a semirigid outer shell, this case can handle the same abuse as a rigid case without the bulkiness and excess weight. Zippered closure keeps eyeglasses secure; soft lining protects delicate lenses.
short_description: Protect your sunglasses with the Pepper's Sport Sunglasses case. This case is ideal for travel, camping and everyday use.
